::: Ominous, Set, and Ra immedietly focus all there fire on the autoguns. 
After taking out three, they charge and take out another. Set, carrying a 
tool ack, pulls out a small rod and throws it agians the wall of the ark. It 
slowly eats away at the wall. A few quick blasts and the wall should crumble. 
:::

OOC: Are the shieds up?
